content: *repeat until 4 stitches left k4 54 stitches remain row 2 knit row row 3 *k3 ktog *repeat until 4 stitches left k4 44 stitches remain row 4 knit row row 5 *k2 ktog *repeat 33 stitches remain row 6 knit row row 7 *k1 ktog * repeat 22 stitches remain row 8 knit row row 9 ktog entire row snip yarn with a 40cm tail using your darning needle thread the remaining 11 stitches off the working yarn onto the tail pull tight and tie off underneath attach pom pom if desired congratulations your supa cosy cute beanie is complete i would love to see your work feel free to email me a photo or post on social media i have a few patterns available with the seamed double brim i find it is comftorable warm and stylish the feedback i get from those who wear them is always positive check out dee kerri & lucy from where you downloaded this pattern from #lilypopcornbeanie #supaknit supaknit@outlook com supaknit this work is copyright apart from any use permitted under the copyright act 1968 no part may be reproduced by any process nor may any other exclusive right be exercised without the permission of tanya johnson 2025
